Strings.Text: It's a water storage tank used \nfor the analysis of water quality.{pause}
It's a large fuel tank. {pause}{clear}Probably used for fueling the \nboat at the dock.{pause}
It's a box for storing small repair \ntools. {pause}{clear}You need the key to open this \nbox.{pause}
There is no need to open it.{pause}
It's the control for operating the \nfuel tank. {pause}{clear}The fuel meter is reading zero. \nThere's no need to operate it.{pause}
There is no need to open it.{pause}
